activity_differential: people walking and conversing on urban sidewalk
people exiting building and moving along street
people carrying items and interacting in public space
description: A group of people are seen exiting a building and walking along a busy urban sidewalk. The camera moves and shifts focus between groups of people and individuals, capturing their movement and interactions as they walk, converse, and carry items. Vehicles are parked along the street, and the environment is decorated with banners and lanterns.

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: A person cannot be realistically 'under' a doormat, which is flat on the ground and intended to be stepped on; the spatial relationship is incorrect.
